text: Patrick Michael DiNizio (October 12, 1955 â€“ December 12, 2017) was an American rock musician. He is best known as the lead singer, songwriter and guitarist of the band The Smithereens. He formed the band with three original members in 1980 in Carteret, New Jersey. He was born in Plainfield, New Jersey, and grew up in Scotch Plains. DiNizio died on December 12, 2017, after a period of ill health in Summit, New Jersey. He was 62. ==References== Category:1955 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in New Jersey Category:American rock guitarists Category:American rock singers Category:American singer-songwriters Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Musicians from New Jersey Category:Singers from New Jersey
title: Pat DiNizio
